required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: French National Observatory of Patients With Thymic Epithelial Tumor
clinical_study.official_title: French National Observatory of Patients With Thymic Epithelial Tumor

brief_summary.textblock: RYTHMIC (Réseau tumeurs THYMiques et Cancer) is a French nationwide network for TET with the objective of territorial coverage by regional expert centers and systematic discussion of patients management at national tumor board.

detailed_description.textblock:
RYTHMIC (Réseau tumeurs THYMiques et Cancer) is a nationwide network for TET appointed in 2012 by the French National Cancer Institute. The objectives of the network are management of clinical tumor boards and central pathologic review of all cases. RYTHMIC Tumor Board is based on initial histopathological diagnosis.
RYTHMIC is a comprehensive tool for research:
- to improve the management of patients
- to monitor dedicated actions
- to screen patients for future translational and clinical trials

primary_outcome.description: histological type according to the WHO classification 2004/2015

secondary_outcome.measure: Questions raised at the national expert multidisciplinary tumor board

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patient with Thymic Epithelial Tumors
Exclusion Criteria:
- histology other than Thymic Epithelial Tumors
